description: This file defines a React functional component called DeviceDetailsPage that renders device details based on a URL hash route. It imports React, a DeviceDetails component, and a custom hook useToast. The component extracts a device ID from the URL hash, provides navigation back to the root, and passes relevant props to the DeviceDetails component.

methods.name: DeviceDetailsPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders device details page based on URL hash.
